//: These are the materials that can be carved off from more than a monster.
name: flame sac
description: A monster's internal organ. Contains a very flammable powder.

name: monoblos fang
description: A large, sturdy fang from a diablos or monoblos. Stays sharp.

name: fire wyvern claw
description: Claws that grow on the wing of a fire wyvern. Can be cut off in battle.

name: fire wyvern fluid
description: Heat producing body fluids from a fire wyvern. Useful in equipment crafting.
